description:
When a private investigator opens up shop next door, Ryo is startled to learn his new rival is Saeko`s little sister, a former police detective.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saeko no Imouto wa Onna Tantei (Zenpen): Passion Lady no Daitan Himitsu
Saeko`s little sister is a private eye! A passionate lady`s big secret (Part One)
冴子の妹は女探偵 (前編) 翔んだ女(パッションレディー)の大胆秘密
